file.name: IOXDIRrivo_Eday_CNRM-CM6-1_pdSST-pdSIC_r1i1p1f1_gn_%start_date%-%end_date%
file.variable: PA1.1: atmosphere only model present day control
PA1.1: atmosphere only model present day control
Atmosphere time slice with present day SST and SIC
CNRM (Centre National de Recherches Meteorologiques, Toulouse 31057, France), CERFACS (Centre Europeen de Recherche et de Formation Avancee en Calcul Scientifique, Toulouse 31057, France)

CMIP6 model data produced by CNRM-CERFACS is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses). Consult https://pcmdi.llnl.gov/CMIP6/TermsOfUse for terms of use governing CMIP6 output, including citation requirements and proper acknowledgment. Further information about this data, including some limitations, can be found via the further_info_url (recorded as a global attribute in this file) and at http://www.umr-cnrm.fr/cmip6/. The data producers and data providers make no warranty, either express or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. All liabilities arising from the supply of the information (including any liability arising in negligence) are excluded to the fullest extent permitted by law.

CNRM-CM6-1 (2017): aerosol: prescribed monthly fields computed by TACTIC_v2 scheme atmos: Arpege 6.3 (T127; Gaussian Reduced with 24572 grid points in total distributed over 128 latitude circles (with 256 grid points per latitude circle between 30degN and 30degS reducing to 20 grid points per latitude circle at 88.9degN and 88.9degS); 91 levels; top level 78.4 km) atmosChem: OZL_v2 land: Surfex 8.0c ocean: Nemo 3.6 (eORCA1, tripolar primarily 1deg; 362 x 294 longitude/latitude; 75 levels; top grid cell 0-1 m) seaIce: Gelato 6.1
CNRM-CM6-1 model output prepared for CMIP6 / PAMIP pdSST-pdSIC

members differ by a slight perturbation in CO2 concentration. Information provided by this attribute may in some cases be flawed. Users can find more comprehensive and up-to-date documentation via the further_info_url global attribute.

field.name: rivo
field.cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
field.variable: area: mean where land time: mean

field.name: wtd
field.cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
field.variable: Depth is the vertical distance below the surface. The water table is the surface below which the soil is saturated with water such that all pore spaces are filled.
area: mean where land time: mean

field.name: areacellr
field.variable: Cell areas for any grid used to report river model variables (may be the same as for atmospheric variables). These cell areas should be defined to enable exact calculation of area integrals (e.g., of vertical fluxes of energy at the surface and top of the atmosphere).
Grid-Cell Area for River Model Variables
